titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller Foundation records, Minutes, Officers' Actions and Annual Reports, RG 16
A Guide to the Rockefeller Foundation records, Minutes, Officers' Actions and Annual Reports, RG 16 FA1609

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-07-01 02:39:26 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Foundation records, Minutes, Officers' Actions and Annual Reports, RG 16

physdesc.extent: 76.2 cubic feet of physical records and 56 microform reels

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in subgroups by record type.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Record Group 16 includes: Minutes and Annual Reports; Officers' Actions; Documents of Record; and Grants and Expenditures.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Rockefeller Foundation has title, copyright, and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them. Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish archival material from the collection.
